name: He who read
description:
He who read is a Visual Novel following the actions and the fate of a man practicing divination by tarot cards  in the City : a city built a long time ago to be utopian. But is it really ?  

Encounter a lot of different protagonists, with their stories, their fears but mostly with their questions.

Will the man who reads tarot cards be able to help them ? Or will he doom them all?

A conversation-built game never seen before ! Depending on the divination, the conversations and the beliefs of the customers will change greatly. 

Even their fate can change.  Every tarot reading will lead to different customers with different stories. So you can expect multiple conversations and endings.

He who read was submitted for the GameDevTv2021 challenge where the theme was " All that glistens is not gold ".  I had the idea for He who read for a while but the Gamejam gave me the opportunity to do a prototype quickly with my own resources. The theme was consistent with the concept of the game and its story : a tarot card reader who need money to keep his business up. Lead by his old golden grand-mother tarot card, he will try to help as many people as possible while trying to save himself.

# ! This is a game still in developement, it is only a prototype version ! #

# ! After the two-week voting period, a new character will be added : Rose ! !#
